meanings.definition: A person who imparts knowledge or information.
meanings.sent1: The teacher is an imparter of wisdom to the students.
meanings.sent2: The librarian is a knowledgeable imparter of information.
meanings.sent3: The wise owl was jokingly referred to as the imparter of all owl knowledge.
meanings.sent4: The imparter of secrets whispered softly in the ears of the curious.
meanings.sent5: The imparter of ancient tales mesmerized the audience with each word.

meanings.definition: To give or pass on something, such as knowledge or a skill.
meanings.sent1: The mentor will imparter valuable skills to the apprentice.
meanings.sent2: She decided to imparter her wisdom to the next generation.
meanings.sent3: The magician impartered his tricks to the eager audience.
meanings.sent4: The wind impartered its secrets to the rustling leaves.
meanings.sent5: The old tree impartered its strength to the young sapling growing beside it.
